constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: A4D Storage and distribution to residential

phasing_details.phase_detail: Relocation and encasement of existing condenser units inside of an acoustic enclosure.

decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify; margin-top: 18pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The external sound level emitted from the plant, machinery, or equipment at the development hereby approved shall be lower than the lowest existing background sound level by at least 10 dBA in order to prevent any adverse impact. The assessment shall be made in accordance with BS 4142 2014 the nearest and/or most affected noise-sensitive premises, with all machinery operating together at maximum capacity. A post-installation noise assessment shall be carried out where required to confirm compliance with the required sound criteria and additional steps to mitigate noise shall be taken as necessary. Approved details shall be implemented prior to the use of the development and thereafter be permanently maintained. The plant shall be serviced regularly in accordance with the manufacturerâs instructions and as necessary to ensure that the requirements of the condition are maintained. If at any time the plant is determined by the local planning authority to be failing to </span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">comply with this condition, it shall be switched off and not used again until it is able to comply.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify; margin-top: 18pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site/ surrounding premises is not adversely affected by noise from machinery and equipment </span><br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">Rubber or Neoprene high-frequency isolation pads shall be introduced to the condensing units. Suitable springs and rubber isolators shall be added as in Appendix D of the Acoustic Report number 2302E8 by Monon Acoustic dated 9 March </span><span class="il" style="font-size: 14px;">2023 within 1 month of the date of this permission</span><span style="font-size: 14px;">. A post-installation test shall be carried out and results submitted in writing to the Local Planning Authority for compliance within 3 months of the date of this permission. </span></span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Approved details shall be implemented prior to the use of the development and thereafter be permanently maintained.</span></p><p><br style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;"></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">: </span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site/ surrounding premises is not adversely affected by vibration.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">An acoustic enclosure shall be introduced within 1 month of the date of this decision to reduce noise breakout from the units to the nearest noise-sensitive receptor. The minimum sound reduction performances required from the acoustic enclosure shall be the same as stated in Table 4 of the Acoustic Report Number 2302E8 by Mono Acoustics dated 9 March </span><span class="il" style="font-size: 14px;">2023</span><span style="font-size: 14px;">. A post-installation noise assessment shall be carried out and results submitted in writing to the Local Planning Authority for compliance within 3 months of the date of this permission. </span></span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Approved details shall be implemented prior to the use of the development and thereafter be permanently maintained</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 17pt 0pt 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">: </span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site/ surrounding premises is not adversely affected by noise from machinery and equipment&nbsp;</span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
description: Relocation of 2x external A/C condenser units at roof level and encasement of the condenser units inside of an acoustic enclosure
